name: AI Chatbot by EmbedAI
author: EmbedAI

sections.description:
AI ChatBot for WordPress – EmbedAI

EmbedAI is an AI chatbot builder, it lets you create a custom GPT chatbot that knows your data.
Just use a web link, upload a pdf or connect your notion and get a chatbot that can answer any question on it.

With this plugin, you can embed your EmbedAI chatbot directly into your WordPress site with very little effort.

Additional info – Third-Party Service Notice

This plugin relies on an external service EmbedAI. Here is the link to the service https://www.thesamur.ai/ and adds an embed code of the chatbot created from EmbedAI derived from dashboard here https://embedai.thesamur.ai/ .

Here is the privacy policy https://www.thesamur.ai/privacy and terms of use https://www.thesamur.ai/terms-conditions
sections.faq:
How do I initialize my chatbot?

With this plugin, you can upload the chatbot ID (found in the script tag provided by EmbedAI, where it says “id=”) by going to the settings on your WordPress dashboard, and pasting it in the textbox.
